Title: Picture Perfect
Description:
Sorry if ya be waitin' long. Sometimes I get lost in de telescope.

Do ya ever find da world be easier understood from a distance? No interference, just nature goin' about its business without us...

<Akunda the Cataloger sighs.>

I see Coralie gave ya a camera. Good.

Take a ride down the river with Fren, and take photographs of some wildlife in dey natural habitats for me to study.
ObjectivesText: Ride the Cataloger's Raft with Fren and take pictures of local wildlife.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Akunda the Cataloger at her camp.
RewardText:
<Akunda flips through the photographs quickly, intently analyzing each one.>

Re-mark-a-ble! Surprisin' too. I've much to learn from these; so many new specimens to document!

Thank you, $n!
